title: Why cant people gift chromas?

replies.body: I think the main reason boils down to the fact that our system can't quite handle being able to check to see if the person you're gifting A) Has the champion for the chroma and B) Has the skin the chroma is for. The way it is now, if you could gift chromas your friend could likely end up with a chroma they can't even use! If you'd like, hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might be able to check everything and make this 'gift' happen on our end though!
